_meta.description: Human-verified citation registry. Each entry uses a 10-character ID (SSPP-CIT##) linking to screenshot evidence.
_meta.instructions: Items are added here ONLY when the site owner verifies them with screenshot evidence. Evidence file must exist or the link triggers ERROR.

convention.description: SS=Section (2 chars), PP=Page (2 chars), CIT=literal, ##=citation number on that page
